data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Lille.
Important block from the Lorient defence as Jonathan Bamba fires in a strike for Lille.
In the minute 6, Lille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Lille are coming forward and Luiz Araujo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 7, Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Lille.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 10, Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Willy Delajod signals a Lille throw-in in Lorient's half.
Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Willy Delajod awards Lorient a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lille to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 14, Throw-in Lorient.
Lille's Jonathan David gets in a shot on goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lorient have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Throw-in for Lille in the half of Lorient.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 18, Lille pushes forward through Yusuf Yazici, whose finish on goal is saved.
In Lille, Yusuf Yazici of Lille is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 19, Lille drive upfield and Jonathan Bamba gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Lorient defender.
Luiz Araujo (Lille) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 22, Jonathan David gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lille.
In Lille Lille attack through Jonathan David. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Lorient in the half of Lille.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille.
Lorient's Laurent Abergel gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lille defender.
In the minute 25, Yusuf Yazici (Lille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille's Jonathan Bamba is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 28, Yusuf Yazici of Lille gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Goal! Yusuf Yazici gives Lille a 1-0 lead in Lille.
In the minute 29, Great play from Jonathan Bamba to set up the goal.
Free kick Lille.
Yoane Wissa (Lorient) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 33, Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Lille, close to Lorient's area.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Lille drives forward and Yusuf Yazici gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Lille to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
At Stade Pierre Mauroy, Xeka has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Attention is being given to Lorient’s Julien Laporte and play has been suspended briefly.
Lorient's Julien Laporte is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 39, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Willy Delajod signals a Lille throw-in in Lorient's half.
Free kick Lille.
In the minute 43, Jonathan David (Lille) fires in a shot – and hits the post!
Lille's Luiz Araujo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Willy Delajod awards Lorient a goal kick.
In the minute 44, In Lille Lille drive forward through Domagoj Bradaric. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Yoane Wissa of Lorient smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 45, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Andrew Gravillon (Lorient) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Lille have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Lille.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lorient.
Lille are in shooting range from this free kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
The first half has been concluded at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
In the minute 45, Houboulang Mendes for Lorient has been booked by Willy Delajod and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Lille in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 49, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in Lille.
Goal! Yusuf Yazici extends Lille's lead to 2-0.
In the minute 51, That's a fine assist from Jonathan David.
Jonathan David for Lille drives towards goal at Stade Pierre Mauroy. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lille.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Lille.
Lille attack but Xeka's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In the minute 57, Goal! Lille extend their lead to 3-0 through Luiz Araujo.
Yusuf Yazici with an assist there.
Pierre-Yves Hamel is replacing Terem Moffi for the away team.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lille.
In the minute 59, Adrian Grbic is replacing Sylvain Marveaux for Lorient at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 60, Jonathan David of Lille smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Lille at Stade Pierre Mauroy.
Throw-in for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 63, Lille push forward at Stade Pierre Mauroy and Benjamin Andre gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lorient defence.
Lille have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Lille surge into the attack at Stade Pierre Mauroy but Adama Soumaoro’s header is off-target.
In the minute 64, It's a goal kick for the away team in Lille.
Throw-in for Lorient close to the penalty box.
Lille awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 66, In Lille a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Lorient needs to be cautious. Lille have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Lorient in the half of Lille.
In the minute 69, Lorient make their third substitution with Enzo Le Fee replacing Armand Lauriente.
The away team replace Trevoh Chalobah with Fabien Lemoine.
Christophe Galtier is making the team's first substitution at Stade Pierre Mauroy with Boubakary Soumare replacing Xeka.
In the minute 70, The home team have replaced Jeremy Pied with Tiago Djalo. This is the second substitution made today by Christophe Galtier.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 72, Pierre-Yves Hamel (Lorient) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Free kick for Lille in their own half.
In the minute 74, Lorient have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Lorient get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lille's half?
In the minute 79, Lorient drives forward and Adrian Grbic gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick Lille.
Fabien Lemoine (Lorient) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 80, Christophe Galtier (Lille) is making a third substitution, with Isaac Lihadji replacing Luiz Araujo.
Jonathan Ikone is on a sub for Yusuf Yazici for Lille.
Lorient awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Lorient.
Lorient are pushing forward but Pierre-Yves Hamel's finish is wide of the goal.
Christophe Pelissier (Lorient) is making a fifth substitution, with Jerome Hergault replacing Houboulang Mendes.
In the minute 84, Lorient have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Lille pushes forward through Isaac Lihadji, whose finish on goal is saved.
Boubakary Soumare (Lille) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
Can Lille get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
In the minute 86, The home team replace Jonathan Bamba with Tim Weah.
In the minute 89, Lille's Isaac Lihadji gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lorient defender.
Corner awarded to Lille.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Lille in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lorient in the half of Lille.
Ball safe as Lille is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 4-0.
Great finish from Jonathan David to give Lille a 4-0 lead.
Isaac Lihadji instrumental with a fine assist.
